name: Windows Electronic Software Download
summary: Learn about .ESD files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: ESD files are encrypted .WIM files. Electronic Software Download creates ESD files used to install, update, or upgrade Windows. For example, Microsoft Upgrade Assistant uses ESD files to upgrade users to new versions of Windows.
You may find ESD files in the following directory:

instructions: ESD files are not meant to be opened. Instead, Windows Upgrade and Update Assistant utilities access ESD files to upgrade Windows to newer versions or updates.
However, you can also open ESD files with several archive programs, such as wimlib, 7-Zip, and PeaZip.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
